ARABIC: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَٰنٍۭ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَٰغِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We had no authority over you. Rather you were unbridled people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We had no power over you. In fact, you were a people rebellious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We had no power over you. You were a rebellious people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We had no authority over you, in fact, you were a rebellious people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And we did not have any control over you; but in fact you yourselves were rebellious.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And we had no authority over you. Nay! But you were a transgressing people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And we had no authority over you, but you were an inordinate people;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: we had no authority over you; no, you were an insolent people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We had no power over you, but ye were wayward folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: we had no power over you; but you yourselves were a rebellious people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And we had over you no authority, but ye were a people exorbitant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We had no authority over you. No, you [yourselves] were a rebellious lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor had we any authority over you. Nay, it was ye who were a people in obstinate rebellion!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And we had no authority over you. Nay! But you were transgressing people (disobedient, polytheists, and disbelievers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We had no authority over you, but you were an insolent nation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We had no authority over you. You yourselves were rebellious people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:30] And we did not have any warrant, any sway or power, over you, to compel you to follow us. Nay, but you [yourselves] were a rebellious folk, astray, like us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We had no power over you) we had no reason or proof to win you over, (but ye were wayward folk) but you were disbelievers in Allah.
